text:
While using JMeter I find that I have to remove components and add them in 
again. I think an enable/disable button for a component or subtree would be 
very useful.

Thanks
Mohan
creator: mv100@softhome.net

text:
I think I could do this relatively easily.
Please note, in the meantime, in 1.7.1, drag n drop works, so you can drag nodes
out of the test into the WorkBench temporarily, and return them when needed.

Yes!  The WorkBench's original purpose in life is finally realized!
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
Hi Mike,

Thanks, I'm sure this enhancement will help all users.

Mohan
creator: mv100@softhome.net

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
